2+1.sig_info: After filling a bar of Power, Magik has a 20% chance to enter a state of Limbo for 3 seconds. The chance increases by 12.5% after filling 2 bars, and by 25% after filling 3 bars. Based on current Signature Level, chances are multiplied by 1 to 100%.
